title: GHOSTBUSTERS: FROZEN EMPIRE
overview: In Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire, the Spengler family returns to where it all started – the iconic New York City firehouse – to team up with the original Ghostbusters.

title: DUNE: PART TWO
overview: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

title: THE PERSIAN VERSION
overview: Coming from two countries at odds with each other, Iranian-American Leila (Layla Mohammadi) strives to find balance and embrace her opposing cultures.

title: INDIANA JONES AND THE LAST CRUSADE (1989)
overview: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler.
